monster.name: Giant Crocodile

trait.name: Hold Breath
trait.text: The crocodile can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The crocodile makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 21 (3d10 + 5) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 16). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the crocodile can't bite another target.

action.name: Tail
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target not grappled by the crocodile. 14 (2d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

monster.description: Source: Monster Manual p. 324, Princes of the Apocalypse, Tomb of Annihilation, Essentials Kit: Dragon of Icespire Peak, Essentials Kit: Storm Lord's Wrath
